text: Is there a reason why the `hs-landing-page`  class it being produced by `{{ builtin_body_classes }}`  for things like password prompt pages?
Where can I go to formally raise this issue?
you can speak to the HS team members here in slack. or go to <#C26E7JT8V|ideas>  and leave a comment there
I know it's a generic class... for landing pages.

Date format question....
Trying to get a variable to contain midnight (00:00:00) for the current date so when I query my hubdb table, i can say give me all events with a Date greater than or equal to "today"...

```{% set todayDate = local_dt|datetimeformat('%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')|unixtimestamp  %}```
This is coming back blank though.
